0XrGeOGMJU5c6OJD.description: The lion deals 1d6 extra precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

ny4lDHUXxKAZn7vm.name: Screaming Skull
ny4lDHUXxKAZn7vm.description: The skeleton removes its skull and throws it, making a jaws Strike with a range of 20 feet. It then attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.nEwqNNWX6scLt4sc]{Demoralize: Intimidation} each foe within @Template[emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} of the target. The head bounces, rolls, or even flies back, returning to the skeleton at the start of its next turn. The skeleton is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until then.

ie7fdb4unyhhf9ap.name: Hunt Prey
ie7fdb4unyhhf9ap.description: The Blue Streak ambusher designates a single creature they can see and hear, or one they're Tracking, as their prey. The ambusher gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek the prey and to Survival checks to Track the prey. This effect lasts until the Blue Streak ambusher uses Hunt Prey again.

tok6ktmeayq1lax2.name: Precision Edge
tok6ktmeayq1lax2.description: The first time the Blue Streak ambusher hits their hunted prey in a round, they deal an additional 1d8 precision damage.

4w30udqtdisaodct.name: Running Reload
4w30udqtdisaodct.description: The Blue Streak ambusher Strides, Steps, or Sneaks, and then Interacts to reload.

G8jXXWOtu6gnnV97.name: Deny Advantage
G8jXXWOtu6gnnV97.description: Neidre isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to hidden, undetected, or flanking creatures of her level or lower, or creatures of her level or lower using surprise attack. However, they can still help their allies flank.

UHEf4AYie1HLfWXG.name: Sneak Attack
UHEf4AYie1HLfWXG.description: Neidre deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

pCGhmbYuaAdSH14h.name: Surprise Attacker
pCGhmbYuaAdSH14h.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to Neidre.

Boggard Swampseer (PFS 1-24).name: Boggard Swampseer (PFS 1-24)
Boggard Swampseer (PFS 1-24).description:
The boggard swampseer has been gifted with magic through its worship of the demon lord Gogunta, and uses its power to rule a boggard village, keeping the rest of the village in line and planning raids on nearby communities.

Boggards are aggressive humanoid amphibians that thrive in swamps, marshes, and even some rain forests. Boggards hatch from eggs into tadpoles, fiercely competing for food and even consuming their siblings in that struggle. Over 3 years, the surviving boggards develops arms, legs, and lungs while learning the rudiments of hunting, crafts, and warfare-everything needed to survive in their might-makes-right society. At the top of most boggard hierarchies lords a hulking swampseer imbued with sinister divine magic.

9SboqcQona3PXQIx.name: Destructive Croak
9SboqcQona3PXQIx.description:
The swampseer utters a powerful croak that deals @Damage[4d6[sonic]] damage to any non-boggard within a @Template[emanation|distance:15] (@Check[fortitude|dc:19|basic] save).

Any creature with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition takes additional sonic damage equal to twice the value of their frightened condition.

The boggard can't use Destructive Croak again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Destructive Croak]]{1d4 rounds}

80CuEcGtDQ6fUIyY.name: Drowning Drone
80CuEcGtDQ6fUIyY.description:
Trigger The boggard swampseer or one of its allies within 60 feet attempts a saving throw against an auditory or sonic effect.

Effect The swampseer releases a croak that drowns out other sound. It rolls a @Check[performance] check. It and boggard allies in the area can use the higher result of the swampseer's Performance check or their saves to resolve the effects against the auditory or sonic effect.

xBIoPO0Yl00JwtXW.name: Swamp Stride
xBIoPO0Yl00JwtXW.description: A boggard swampseer ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features.

z8bl09rqF4yCJDy4.name: Terrifying Croak
z8bl09rqF4yCJDy4.description:
The boggard swampseer unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within @Template[emanation|distance:30] becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} unless they succeed at a @Check[will|dc:19] save.

Those who critically succeed are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

A33mGw1DCgRJRDSe.name: Tongue Grab
A33mGw1DCgRJRDSe.description:
If the boggard swampseer hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the boggard. Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the boggard's tongue.

A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 15 and dealing at least 4 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

07Zd8jFiGqZIrBr5.name: Infused Items
07Zd8jFiGqZIrBr5.description: Iloise's items listed as infused last for 24 hours, or until the next time she makes her daily preparations.

TpiaVzI9mWCy28Pm.name: Consecration Vulnerability
TpiaVzI9mWCy28Pm.description: In a place of worship dedicated to a non-evil deity or on sacred ground, such as an area blessed by sanctified ground, Iloise is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.

dRpPeplVvulcmfBO.name: Shock Field
dRpPeplVvulcmfBO.description:
Trigger A creature hits Iloise with a melee Strike

Effect A surge of energy lashes out at the attacker and propels Iloise away from danger. The triggering creature takes @Damage[2d6[electricity]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:19|basic] save). If a reach weapon was used to make the attack, the result of the Reflex save is one degree of success better. Iloise then Steps 10 feet away from the attacker

Ek3euvo1C9KOSMwN.name: Death Gasp
Ek3euvo1C9KOSMwN.description:
Iloise draws in a deep breath and holds it, temporarily suspending her biological processes and becoming undead. She gains the undead trait and becomes immune to bleed, death effects, disease, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, and poison. Any such effects she is currently suffering from are suspended. Death Gasp lasts as long as she holds her breath.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.lyeRL7khixdlJsaf]{Effect: Death Gasp}

VlfOJF1BHt8zNTFH.name: Quick Bomber
VlfOJF1BHt8zNTFH.description: Iloise can use Interact to draw a bomb, then Strike with it

glK4yrkNZ3iZbQE0.name: Iron Mind
glK4yrkNZ3iZbQE0.description: Duergar taskmasters automatically disbelieve all illusions of 1st level or lower.

fgQF6b4yTtZ5XBBR.name: Light Blindness
fgQF6b4yTtZ5XBBR.description: When first exposed to bright light, the duergar is blinded until the end of their next turn. After this exposure, light doesn't blind them again until after they spend 1 hour in darkness. However, as long as the duergar is in an area of bright light, they're dazzled.

ahs6BwuJu117oQYI.name: Take Them Down!
ahs6BwuJu117oQYI.description:
The duergar taskmaster smashes their maul into the ground and invokes Droskar's name to rally their allies to action. All allied duergars of equal or lower level that are within @Template[emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} of the duergar taskmaster gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the duergar taskmaster's next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.u1Z7i2RyL6Sd9OVU]{Effect: Take Them Down!}

kSC9r4Mlz30D3bRE.name: Avenging Bite
kSC9r4Mlz30D3bRE.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the warg's jaws attacks one of the warg's allies

Effect The warg makes a jaws Strike against the triggering creature.

sKgV1Xe889zCHUat.name: Pack Attack
sKgV1Xe889zCHUat.description: The warg's Strikes deals an extra 1d6 damage to any creature within reach of at least two of the warg's allies.
